text:
Just added an idea to add filtering to the Page module field, similar to what ACFâ€™s Relationship field allows. Also, increase call limit on some of the functions like content_by_id if anyone is also struggling with that.
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-content-filtering-into-the-Page-module-field/idi-p/366323#M63810>

Can the CMS CLI tool be smart enough to match up the dest with the local path either using the module_id or some other metadata?

It would be ideal to use hs upload <module_[name,id]> instead of having to declare the dest
